title: [Self-Directed] Language Pattern Recognition Training Through Implicit Grammar Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental grammatical structures and language learning principles
context.additional_context: A program applying implicit learning principles to naturally acquire grammatical structures in an informal educational setting for working professionals.

learning_goals: After 5 days of implicit learning, learners can perform familiarity-based preference classification with over 70% accuracy for unseen grammatical structures.
Learners can apply cognitive processing strategies associated with the prefrontal cortex (BA 44/45, BA 8/32) and the basal ganglia during implicit learning.
Learners can utilize knowledge acquired during the learning process for practical language pattern analysis without explicit grammar rule explanations.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
